mutation {
	createDataproduct(
		input: {
			name: "DpWithPii"
			description: "Description"
			repo: "somerepo"
			pii: true
			group: "team@nav.no"
			bigquery: { projectID: "team-dev-1337", dataset: "dataset1", table: "table1" }
		}
	) {
		id
		name
		description
		repo
		pii
		owner { group }
	}
}

RETURNS

OPTION data.createDataproduct.id=IGNORE

ENDOPTS
{
  "data": {
    "createDataproduct": {
      "name": "DpWithPii",
      "description": "Description",
      "owner": {
        "group": "team@nav.no"
      },
      "pii": true,
      "repo": "somerepo"
    }
  }
}

STORE pii_dataproduct_id=data.createDataproduct.id
